text: David Mintz may refer to: *David Hammerstein Mintz (born 1955), American-born Spanish politician *David Mintz, New York restaurateur and founder of Tofutti Brands *David Liebe Hart (born 1955, uses the name David Liebe Mintz), American outsider musician, street performer, artist, puppeteer and actor *David Mintz (judge) (born 1959), judge of the Supreme Court of Israel
title: David Mintz
